commit message:
Merge branch 'master' into gallery-view

Conflicts:
App/res/values/strings.xml
App/src/com/dozuki/ifixit/dozuki/ui/SiteListActivity.java

Merge pull request #31 from iFixit/code-cleanup

Code cleanup
Only display site title for Dozuki app.
[] bug with 'no images' text showing up in login screen

[] Issue with broken pipe and server closing ...

stream to soon. before the app will crash, media activity will close
gracefully.

[]fecthed out categories on resume

when topics activity is paused, before  the categories returned, they
will never be listed on resume. fixed now.

login for multiple dozuki sites

main application now handles all access to preference files

User object no longer persisted across...

dozuky sites

logout dialog no longer...

persists on orientation change
Use the current site's domain for the cookie.

-Proper error messeges.

These messeges must of been deleted in the merge. I retrieved them from
an old version.
Fix OpenID login for dozuki sites.
Prevent any Activity from using GuideViewActivity
Add content description to login buttons.
Convert windows format xml files to unix format.
Make shared preferences private to current App.

Fix whitespace issues.

Mainly trailing whitespace and tabs.
Change instances of fill_parent to match_parent.
Fix grammar mistake in delete image error.
Minor cleanup for WebView and TopicsActivity
Make sure the request is okay
Switch all endpoints over to the new Intent system
Upgrade AndroidImageManager to fix image bug.
Make some static methods member methods.
Remove unnecessary member variable from Gallery

Fix default selected topic view tab.

It was unconditionally selecting the guides tab because it is the first
one. When adding a new tab it becomes selected if it's the first one.
I'm not sure when this started happening but I think it was after
upgrading ActionBarSherlock.

Error now a seperate class

error will now contain the error from the server. error still contains
the old error enum.
No Connection Dialog on cancel will kill activity
registration and login error messeges from server
fixed the issue with double error dialog
Login Fragment is now a Dialog

Login clean up

since login is a dialog I cleaned up some of the gallery views.
Also, the login dialog is no sensitive nto no connection
using getActivity in the lgin dialog

Updatedconfusing function name

The login view has two states. The first being just a plain login
interface, and the other being a registration interface. The function
changes the state to the appropriate layout depending on the state
variable mReadyForRegisterState.

code cleanup

deleted unneccesary code. added coments.

code clean up

added parse error dialog to login.
removed unused code.

Removed static references

Any activity using login dialogmust implement loginListener
addressed missing super call and moved code from getcount

Code clean up

added coments and formating fixes

Removing an unused constant

This was originally here when we were debuging, but should not be in the
release.
Cleanup imports and a few warnings.

Moved site list to dialog

The site list was completely cut off on 7in tablets in landscape mode during
search when the keyboard popped up.   Moving the list into a dialog fixes this.
This is still rough, and needs more visual work.
Tweaked dozuki site list dialog and added search view to dialog
Get the site list to work in the DialogFragment.
Both phones and tablets now use a site list dialog
Added different densities of dozuki site list and logo

Merge remote-tracking branch 'fireswing/gallery-view'
